sn22.86:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn22.86:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anurādho bhagavato avidūre araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharati.
sn22.86:4.3: Atha kho sambahulā aññatitthiyā paribbājakā yenāyasmā anurādho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.86:4.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
sn22.86:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṃ anurādhaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.86:4.7: “yo so, āvuso anurādha, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, taṃ tathāgato imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:4.8: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā”ti?
sn22.86:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā anurādho te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavoca:
sn22.86:5.2: “yo so āvuso tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṃ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:5.3: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā”ti.
sn22.86:5.4: Evaṃ vutte, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṃ anurādhaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.86:5.5: “so cāyaṃ bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto”ti.
sn22.86:5.6: Atha kho aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṃ anurādhaṃ navavādena ca bālavādena ca apasādetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn22.86:6.1: Atha kho āyasmato anurādhassa acirapakkantesu tesu aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:6.2: “sace kho maṃ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā uttariṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyuṃ.
sn22.86:6.3: Kathaṃ byākaramāno nu khvāhaṃ tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assaṃ, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyaṃ, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyaṃ, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn22.86:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā anurādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.86:7.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā anurādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.86:7.5: Atha kho, bhante, sambahulā aññatitthiyā paribbājakā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu … pe …
sn22.86:7.7: ‘yo so, āvuso anurādha, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṃ tathāgato imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamāno paññāpeti—
sn22.86:7.8: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti …
sn22.86:7.9: hoti ca na ca hoti, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā’”ti?
sn22.86:8.1: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavocaṃ:
sn22.86:8.2: “yo so, āvuso, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, taṃ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:8.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vāti.
sn22.86:8.5: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā maṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.86:8.6: ‘so cāyaṃ bhikkhu na vo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero vā pana bālo abyatto’ti.
sn22.86:8.7: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā navavādena ca bālavādena ca apasādetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn22.86:9.1: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:9.2: ‘sace kho maṃ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā uttariṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyuṃ.
sn22.86:9.3: Kathaṃ byākaramāno nu khvāhaṃ tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assaṃ, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyaṃ, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyaṃ, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyā’”ti?
sn22.86:10.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.86:10.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.86:10.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn22.86:11.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha, rūpaṃ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.86:12.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha, rūpasmiṃ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.86:14.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha, ayaṃ so arūpī …
sn22.86:15.1: “Ettha ca te, anurādha, diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne kallaṃ nu te taṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ:
sn22.86:15.2: ‘yo so, āvuso, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṃ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti—
sn22.86:15.6: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā’”ti?
sn22.86:16.2: Pubbe cāhaṃ, anurādha, etarahi ca dukkhañceva paññapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodhan”ti.
